schema:creator: Choquette, Catherine
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I centered the image on the Hotdogger because it's one of my favorite restaurants in Davis. I used pixel art to create an image of anthropomorphic products from various businesses in Davis (for example a Farmer's Market hat) walking around while people stay inside.  
 __Participant age:__ 19  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Graphic Art
schema:name: The Hotdogger / An Outing in Davis
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
